history.proof: intros. pose (f := fun x : X => if (Dec (p x)) then true else false). exists f. intros x. split. - intros Hp. unfold f. destruct (Dec (p x)). + reflexivity. + contradiction. - intros Hftrue. unfold f in Hftrue. destruct (Dec (p x)). + qsimpl use: dec_DN. + discriminate.

ctx: pose (f := fun x : X => if (Dec (p x)) then true else false).
pose (f := fun x : X => if (Dec (p x)) then true else false).
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet +.

original: intros X p H. pose (f := fun x : X => if (Dec (p x)) then true else false). exists f. intros x. split. - intros Hp. unfold f. destruct (Dec (p x)). + reflexivity. + contradiction. - intros Hftrue. unfold f in Hftrue. destruct (Dec (p x)). + apply dec_DN in d. contradiction. + discriminate.
